com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils

Class DragScrollListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.InputListener
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.DragListener
        • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.DragScrollListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener

    public class DragScrollListener
extends DragListener
    Causes a scroll pane to scroll when a drag goes outside the bounds of the scroll pane.
    Author:
    Nathan Sweet
